name: Big Mother
description:
This is a game about a planet how needs your help.  

There is no progression in the game. There is no game over. The time passes and the big mother changes,  but something is wrong. Can you help her?

Enjoy and please leave a comment about your experience. And don´t forget take pictures and share it with the hashtag #BIGMOTHERGAME on Twitter.

Thanks for stopping by!
